forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy early with showers becoming more intermittent for the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 12C. SSW winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy this morning with showers becoming less numerous during the afternoon hours. Thunder possible. High 53F. SSW winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low around 45F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds NE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 54F. Winds NE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. Low 8C. Winds N at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 47F. Winds N at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the evening, becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early, becoming a steady light rain late. Low 46F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain diminishing to a few showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain diminishing to a few showers in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Becoming windy late. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 51F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High 14C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. High 58F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 54F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 53F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 38F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 51F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 53F. E winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph.
